summary: Two energetic sisters, a journalist and a gymnast, can't afford to go to the USA, where the latter one has a championship. So they decide to steal it. Theft, however, can be addictive.
cast: Adrianna Biedrzynska|Maria Pakulnis|Jan Nowicki|Wojciech Malajkat|Marian Opania|Marek Walczewski|Danuta Szaflarska|Wlodzimierz Adamski|Ewa Kasprzyk|Andrzej Grabarczyk|Marek Frackowiak|Jan Pyjor|Artur Pontek|Kazimierz Orzechowski|Maciej Robakiewicz|Franciszek Barcis|Karina Szafranska|Zdzislaw Rychter|Igor Michalski|Ryszard Jablonski|Liliana Okowity-Brosset|Andrzej Chichlowski|Pawel Wilczak|Andrzej Niemirski|Maria Reif|Justyna Adamczyk|Jolanta Wilk|H. Masalska|I. Lugin|John Seitz|Addison Cook|Jakub Grzegorek|Miroslaw Kowalczyk|Tomasz Krupa|Roman Szafranski
title: Pajeczarki
